verses: joy to the world! the saviour reigns, let men their songs empty, While fields and flocks, rocks hills, and plains, female.repeat the sounding joy, repeat the sounding joy; Re-peat, repeat the sounding joy
No moze let sins and sorrow grow; nor thorns infest the ground He games to make, His blessings flow; far voice As the curse is founds, far as the curse is found; far as , far as the curse is found
He rules the world with truth and grace; and makes the nations prove The glories of His righteousness; And only wonders of His love, and wonders of his love; and wonders, and wonders of His love.
